title: This game should have 5 bans each
body: This game should have 5 bans each. It will make the game 10000k times better.

replies.body: agreed. this game is too big. there's too many champions. It would make picking champions MUCH more dynamic. we can ban the SAME OLD champions being picked every game. It will open up more diversity to games.
So, like, each person gets 5 bans? So you can only pick from half of the champion pool?
50 bans per game. You have to lock in each one or the queue dodges. (Saw theme plays)

How hard is it to have bans scale with # of champions?
We've always had 6 bans, but now we have more than 40 champs.

> [{quoted}](name=Ratbert,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2reRhuUd,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-01-31T01:45:33.800+0000)
>
> How hard is it to have bans scale with # of champions?
> We've always had 6 bans, but now we have more than 40 champs.

We haven't "always" had 6 bans. 6 is actually what it was raised to. Which is why they should raise it as their is already a precedent for doing so in the past with a much smaller amount that caused it to raise previously.

If we had the same percentage of bans as we used to, we'd have 20 bans. Which means everyone would get two bans. Which is more than enough to completely ban out an entire role, which Riot claims is the primary reason they don't want more bans.

> [{quoted}](name=Hellioning,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2reRhuUd,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-01-31T01:48:10.401+0000)
>
> If we had the same percentage of bans as we used to, we'd have 20 bans. Which means everyone would get two bans. Which is more than enough to completely ban out an entire role, which Riot claims is the primary reason they don't want more bans.

If riot didn't constantly fuck up the balance for entire "roles", they wouldn't have to worry about said thing.
Right, so do it in moderation.
We need that many bans with how Riot balances the game now.

The new champ select gives the bottom 3 players a chance to ban one champion  - there's no reason it can't be extended to the top two as well other than "meh, we don't feel like it."

I think it's more that by increasing the ban number, they'd be admitting that the game is not in a healthy place and requires more bans just to remove some of the toxicity.  We all know how prideful Riot is in their decisions so I wouldn't look forward to it, but rather just keep hoping they see reason at some point.

Correction, they have like two valid reasons for leaving it at three bans. They've given their reasons multiple times across multiple threads and whatnot. I'm not going to take the time to list their reasons because to be quite frank with you, I don't think you'll listen to me this time if you didn't listen to them all those times. If you legitimately want to know, I'm sure you can hunt the threads down. I know it was addressed at least once in a rito post right before season 5 ended.
or at least 4 bans lol
An increase of 4 bans* ;)
5ban each here the result of every ranked game..  Mundo, gangplank, elise, graves, malphite, poppy, shen, tahm kench, zed, kindred.
I'd support this.  Only drawback I see is that the pick phase will take a bit longer.
That is ridiculous. 10 bans in total?? That's like 1/12 of the entire champion pool. I can see 4, but not 5

I didn't want to upvote this thread because at the time of my post, it was currently sitting at 69 upvotes. Unfortunately, I had to do it for the greater good. This is in hopes that Riot will notice. Don't let this upvote be in vain.

Every player gets a ban.
Should be a simple concept to put in place and see how it is on PBE.

But..of course they won't.
So, like, you ban your counter everygame?
Upvoted
i totally agree
4 bans each is completely perfect.
the 'k' at the end of your 10000 was obnoxious
haha so true

Nope, less bans. Individual champions aren't the problem, there's always another one that does a slighter worse job of what you want from the original. Maybe there'll be one whose kit fits into the meta a little *too* well but you can always ban or (gasp) counterpick for that one.
People complain about how long Pick/Ban takes already... why make it longer?
